salamander noun [C]
(IN KITCHEN)
(also salamander grill) a piece of kitchen equipment with which food can be heated at a very high temperature from above, used especially in the kitchens of restaurants: Cook the steak under the salamander. The salamander grill gives off an intense heat.
More examplesFewer examplesThe dish is then placed under a salamander until the cheese browns.A salamander is a commercial grill that can be heated to high temperatures.This electric salamander is ideal for grilling.
